root: ^These are the words of--hold the door! Diwo take you, hold the door! No, don’t send that part--ugh. Listen. We were besieged midway through rebuilding! The ungrateful peasants cannot scrounge up enough to feed themselves, and have come to take what is mine by right of rule!
^They have let the Sea Peoples turn their minds to sedition and dissent! Soldiers, I need soldiers to destroy them! Send them this instant, or--or I will destroy you, too! Hello? Is it sending?
